events.message: We have received your application for the software engineer position and will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under Engineering roles, specifically for software development.
A recruiter has been assigned to your profile and will contact you soon for the next steps.
The initial screening call was conducted successfully to assess your experience and suitability for the engineer role.
Thank you for your prompt response and for sharing additional details about your previous software projects.
We have scheduled your technical interview for the software engineer position on April 16th at 2 PM UTC.
You successfully completed the technical interview focused on coding, problem solving, and system design.
Your HR interview is scheduled for April 18th at 10 AM UTC to discuss company culture and benefits.
The HR interview was completed and you expressed strong alignment with the company's values and work environment.
An official offer for the software engineer position has been proposed to you including salary and benefits details.
We received your feedback expressing excitement about the offer and eagerness to join the engineering team.
You have formally accepted the offer and confirmed your start date as May 5th, 2024.
Your onboarding process has started with orientation sessions and setup for development tools.
The hiring process is now officially closed and you are fully integrated into the engineering team.
